name: Moonlight Dreamblade
loreDescription: "Whether you take the path before you or not, it's all your choice to make," the White Shining Blade's voice whispered in my mind.

skillDescription.base: Increases Evasion Chance by 10.0%. After successfully evading, the caster is granted increased Attack.
skillDescription.max: Increases Evasion Chance by 20.0%. After successfully evading, the caster is granted increased Attack.
